name: Whot Multiplayer
description:
Whot Multiplayer is a cross-platform turn based shedding card game where two or more players battle it out to be the first player to get rid of their cards. The eventual idea is that more players will get to compete against each other in different rooms (or battle arenas like clash of clans) based on variations in whot! rules.

NOTE: This is a very early release (First Playable or Pre-Alpha) of the game so it might be buggy. Also to note, for now only 20 concurrent players can be on the game at once. Meaning only 5 rooms can be active at once if 4 players are in each 5 rooms.  Other players would then not be able to join in on the action.
